metricsToTrack.sqlQuery: SELECT SUM(arr) as total_arr FROM ANALYTICS.finance.arr_metrics WHERE date = CURRENT_DATE
SELECT SUM(mrr) as total_mrr FROM ANALYTICS.finance.revenue_metrics WHERE date = CURRENT_DATE
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT customer_id) as active_customers FROM ANALYTICS.product.user_activity WHERE month = DATE_TRUNC('month', CURRENT_DATE)
SELECT SUM(new_arr - churned_arr) as net_new_arr FROM ANALYTICS.finance.arr_changes WHERE date >= DATE_TRUNC('month', CURRENT_DATE)
SELECT churn_rate FROM ANALYTICS.finance.churn_metrics WHERE date = CURRENT_DATE
